mapper.select: SELECT a.IDX , a.TITLE , a.CONTENT , a.INSERT_TIME , a.UPDATE_TIME , a.DELETE_TIME , a.DELETE_YN , a.PRICE , a.DISCOUNT_PER , a.USER_COUNT , a.ITEM_VIEW , a.ITEM_DATE , a.ITEM_COUNT , a.DEPART_DATE , a.USER_IDX , a.THUMNAIL , a.AREA , a.VIEW_COUNT , a.REVIEW_COUNT , b.data FROM ITEMS a LEFT JOIN FILES b ON a.IDX = b.ITEM_IDX WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT IDX, TITLE, CONTENT, AREA, PRICE, DISCOUNT_PER FROM ITEMS WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND AREA = #{area}
SELECT IDX, TITLE, CONTENT, AREA, PRICE, DISCOUNT_PER FROM ITEMS WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND IDX = #{idx}
SELECT IDX, TITLE, CONTENT, AREA, PRICE, DISCOUNT_PER FROM ITEMS WHERE NOT AREA IN ('부산','서울','제주도','광주','포항','전주','대구')
SELECT IDX, TITLE, CONTENT, AREA, PRICE, DISCOUNT_PER FROM ITEMS WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY PRICE ASC
SELECT IDX, TITLE, CONTENT, AREA, PRICE, DISCOUNT_PER, VIEW_COUNT FROM ITEMS WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY VIEW_COUNT DESC
SELECT IDX, TITLE, CONTENT, AREA, PRICE, DISCOUNT_PER, VIEW_COUNT, REVIEW_COUNT FROM ITEMS WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY REVIEW_COUNT DESC
